p: The qualitative phytochemical screening was performed to ensure the presence or absence of secondary plant metabolites. Phytochemical screening results of MECD extract showed in Table 1. From the tabular presentation, it should be mentioned that alkaloids, flavonoids, saponins, and tannins are highly present; carbohydrate, protein, and phenolic compounds are moderately present; glycosides are mildly present and terpenoids are absent in the MECD stems.
